QuestData.Title: Baelog, the Glass Cannon
QuestData.Description: Before I start droppin' arrows on those dragons, I'd better introduce myself.$b$bI'm Baelog, the muscle of this group. My sword bites like a crocolisk, and my arrows sing like banshees. I tend to wear down quickly, however, and can't take as much punishment as either of my two brothers.$b$bYou give the word, and I'll send an aimed shot right through your target's heart. I can also cheer my brothers on, sending 'em into a battle-fueled frenzy.$b$bWhy don't we go try fighting together?
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Baelog's Valhalla Shot and Baelog's Warcry.
QuestData.RewardText: I think you're ready, $n. You're getting the hang of this.
